value.title: StarCraft 2: Serral CHEESES Clem! (Best-of-5)
value.excerpt: One of the best series of Zerg versus Terran in StarCraft 2 that I've seen recently. In this match between Serral and Clem, we see Serral going for some very strange build orders that seem to throw Clem off guard.
